snippet.title: The Universim Game Trailer | Now Live On Kickstarter
snippet.description:
Support Us on Kickstarter: http://www.KS.theuniversim.com

Hi everyone, check out my game The Universim. We need your support it is now Live on Kickstarter. Please share this trailers and/or our Kickstarter page with your friends and relatives.

Thank you for your Awesomeness!

Leave the farms and cities behind, jump straight into managing your own planets in The Universim, a new planet management god-game in development by Crytivo Games. The Universim moves away from the typical god-game formula by introducing an entirely dynamic, living world for the player to interact with. This isn't the same static world that you are accustomed to; life goes on with or without your guidance. You are effectively taking control of a living simulation, an unpredictable world that allows you to change everything, or merely observe.
